data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Faridkot, Punjab, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Faridkot, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Faridkot, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Faridkot, Punjab, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Faridkot, Punjab, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jat Dhariwal (Hindu traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jat Dhariwal (Hindu traditions) people.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Faridkot, Punjab, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,793 believers in Faridkot to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Faridkot, Punjab, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

location.name: Faridkot
location.people_groups_list: Jat Dosanj, Rajput Atiras, Brahmin Pushkarna, Jat Dehia (Sikh traditions), Jat Dhanewar
